data.name: Owner_Onboard_Content
data.value: Congratulations! You now have access to the HomeAway Mobile Hospitality Manager.

data.name: Owner_Onboard_Content_Section1_Content
data.value:
The Mobile Hospitality Manager puts useful information about your property directly into your guests’ hands via the mobile website or the HomeAway mobile app.

Here’s how it works: once a guest books your holiday home, we’ll invite them to download the app or go to the mobile site so that they can access the helpful tips you’ve provided, such as check-in instructions, directions to your rental and recommendations on local restaurants. They’ll also receive a welcome and thank you message, as well as a request to leave a review just before the end of their stay.

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section1_Title
data.value: What is the Mobile Hospitality Manager?

data.name: Owner_Onboard_PreHeader
data.value: Enhance your guests' stay by adding information

data.name: Owner_Onboard_Title
data.value: Give your guests the information they need... just when they need it

data.name: Traveler_PrimaryInvite_Content
data.value: Congratulations on booking a (Brand.Name) holiday home. To make your forthcoming stay even more convenient, all the information you need about your rental is online, so it can be accessed whenever you need it.

data.name: Traveler_PrimaryInvite_PreHeader
data.value: Access info about your forthcoming stay

data.name: Traveler_PrimaryInvite_Section1_Content
data.value: Whether you’re on a smartphone, tablet, or computer, you can click below to see everything you need to know about your (Rental.City) holiday, arrival information and directions, as well as recommendations on which restaurants, activities and events to discover during your stay.

data.name: Traveler_PrimaryInvite_Title
data.value: Welcome (Guest.FirstName)

data.name: Owner_Guest_ContentRequested_PreHeader
data.value: Update your rental information now for current and future guests

data.name: Owner_Guest_ContentRequested_Title
data.value: Give your guests the information they need

data.name: Owner_Guest_ContentRequested_Content
data.value:
One of your guests, (Guest.FirstName) has tried to access (Content.Description), which you have not yet provided. Make it easy for them to get it when they need it.

Once you’ve entered this information in the Mobile Hospitality Manager, you’ll never have to provide it again – it will be in the system for all of your guests to access. This will make future stays easier for you and will ensure that all of your guests have the best stay possible!

data.name: Owner_Guest_GuestOfGuestInvited_Content
data.value:
(Guest.FirstName) or someone in their party has submitted a review of your property. We are currently ensuring that it meets our content guidelines before posting it for others to see.

Once the review has been approved, it will appear on your listing and in the Mobile Hospitality Manager. This process generally takes a few days.

data.value: (Guest.FirstName) has downloaded the app and recently logged into the Mobile Hospitality Manager. If you haven’t already, now’s the time to enter useful information about your property that they might need. This will ensure that your guests have the best stay possible. Once you’ve updated the content, it will be available to all your guests, so you only have to do it once!

data.name: Owner_System_Welcomed_Content
data.value: (Guest.FirstName) will be staying at your holiday home in two days' time. If you haven’t already, you should unlock your rental access information so that they'll know how to access your property. Be sure to include other useful pre-arrival details such as driving directions and check-in instructions.

data.name: Owner_Owner_UpcomingReservation_Content
data.value: (Guest.FirstName)’s stay at your holiday home begins in a few days. This means that we'll be sending a welcome email tomorrow with a link for them to access the Mobile Hospitality Manager, which includes information about your property to make their stay the best it can be. There are two things that you need to do to be sure that you’re ready:

data.value: (Guest.FirstName) arrives in three days' time

data.value: Write a review about your holiday rental

data.name: Traveler_System_SignGuestbook_Title
data.value: How was your stay?

data.name: Traveler_System_SignGuestbook_Content
data.value:
Every holiday must come to an end, and your stay is almost over. But before you go back to the hustle and bustle of your everyday life, please take a few moments to let us know how you enjoyed your time at (Rental.Name).

Click below to let the owner or property manager know how you enjoyed their holiday home. It only takes a minute.

data.value: Please write a review

data.name: Owner_Owner_UpcomingReservation_Content_Section1_Content
data.value: For security reasons, guests cannot view your property’s access information until you approve it. Click "Allow" in the "Pre-Arrival" information of the "My Guests" tab.

data.name: Owner_Owner_UpcomingReservation_Content_Section1_Title
data.value: 1. Unlock your rental access information

data.name: Owner_Owner_UpcomingReservation_Content_Section2_Content
data.value: In addition to giving them the ability to access your property, you can add suggestions about where they might eat, shop for groceries, etc.

data.name: Owner_Owner_UpcomingReservation_Content_Section2_Title
data.value: 2. Add useful information about your property

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section1_Content
data.value:
The Mobile Hospitality Manager puts useful information about your property directly into your guests’ hands via the mobile website or the HomeAway mobile app.

Here’s how it works: once a guest books your holiday home, we’ll invite them to download the app or go to the mobile site so that they can access the helpful tips you’ve provided, such as check-in instructions, directions to your rental and recommendations on local restaurants. They’ll also receive a welcome and thank you message, as well as a request to leave a review just before the end of their stay.

data.name: Traveler_Guest_GuestOfGuestInvite_Content_Section1
data.value: Whether you’re on a smartphone, tablet, or computer, you can click below to see everything you need to know about your (Rental.City) holiday, arrival information and directions, as well as recommendations on which restaurants, activities and events to discover during your stay.

data.name: Traveler_Guest_GuestOfGuestInvite_Followup_Content_Section1
data.value: Click below to see everything you need to know about your (Rental.City) rental. Whether you’re on your computer, smartphone, or tablet, everything you need is there when you need it – your reservation, arrival information, and directions, as well as recommendations on which restaurants, activities and events to discover during your stay.

data.name: Traveler_Guest_Invite_Content_Section1
data.value: Whether you’re on a smartphone, tablet, or computer, you can click below to see everything you need to know about your (Rental.City) holiday, arrival information and directions, as well as recommendations on which restaurants, activities and events to discover during your stay.

data.name: Traveler_Guest_Invite_Followup_Content_Section1
data.value: Click below to see everything you need to know about your (Rental.City) vacation. Whether you’re on your computer, smartphone, or tablet, everything you need is there when you need it – your reservation, arrival information, and directions, as well as recommendations on which restaurants, activities and events to discover during your stay.

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section2_Content
data.value:
Starting on (Owner.GracePeriodExpiration), your future guests will be invited to download the app to see information about their forthcoming stay with you. They can also access it online.

Update the Mobile Hospitality Manager so that they have access to everything they need to make their stay an unforgettable one. You only have to do this once: all future guests will be able to access it at any time!

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section2_Title
data.value: What do you need to do?

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Content_Section3_Content
data.value:
• Add helpful information such as directions and nearby places of interest
  • Provide details such as access codes and Wi-Fi passwords (think of the things you're frequently asked for)
  • Customise your welcome and thank you messages

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section1_Content
data.value: Starting on (Owner.GracePeriodExpiration), your guests will be invited to see information about their forthcoming stay at your property. Update the Mobile Hospitality Manager so that they have access to everything they need to make their stay an unforgettable one. You only have to do this once: all future guests will be able to access it at any time!

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section1_Title
data.value: What do you need to do?

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section2_Content
data.value:
• Add helpful information such as directions and nearby places of interest
  • Provide details such as access codes and Wi-Fi passwords (think of the things you're frequently asked for)
  • Customise your welcome and thank you messages

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section3_Content
data.value: You can always access your Mobile Hospitality Manager through the "Hospitality" link in your dashboard.

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section4_Content
data.value: To activate the experience for your guests before (Owner.GracePeriodExpiration), select the "My Guests" tab in the "Hospitality" section and click the "Invite guests" button.

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section4_Title
data.value: Want to activate your mobile experience sooner?

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section5_Title
data.value: See how Lianna uses the Mobile Hospitality Manager to provide her guests with an unforgettable experience

data.name: Owner_System_OnBoard_Followup_Content_Section6_Title
data.value: Learn more about the Mobile Hospitality Manager
